author: hdxhaha
content:
<@301186049323958275> Hi, after merge, is there difference about geth api?
I understand the apis will be fully compatible with before after merge, except some value maybe set to be constant such as difficulty, nonce...etc

author: sky.cactus
content: I don't know what exactly, if anything, will change with The Merge regarding the JSON-RPC API.  Best bet would be to test your software against Sepolia to find out if anything you depend on has changed.
